summary: Shark LAN gaming event website: Multi-tab landing page with animated/cartoon style, vibrant teen-friendly design featuring Home, Tickets, Schedule/Events, Support, and Contact/Location tabs
architectural_notes: Multi-tab navigation structure with Home, Tickets, Schedule/Events, Support, Contact/Location
Dropdown menus required for Schedule/Events and Support tabs
Animated/cartoon visual style with bold outlines and neon color palette (blues, cyan, RGB)
Placeholders needed for TBD date/time and ticket purchase links
Event schedule runs until midnight on both nights

existing_features.title: Create a multi-tab navigation system with five tabs: Home, Tickets, Schedule/Events, Support, and Contact/Location. Navigation should be persistent across all pages with active state indication.
Implement Home tab page displaying event title 'Shark LAN', an animated banner section, and key highlights of the Shark LAN gaming event.

Implement Tickets tab page showing three tiered ticket options (£5, £10, £15) with unique ticket numbers, clear indication that players must bring their own PC/console, and display of 50 player capacity limit. Include placeholder for ticket purchase links.
Implement Schedule/Events tab page with a dropdown menu that reveals Day 1 and Day 2 schedules separately, including tournament information and game lineup for each day.
Implement Support tab page with a dropdown menu providing access to FAQ section, event rules, contact form, and troubleshooting/tech support information.
Implement Contact/Location tab page displaying event venue information, an embedded or linked map showing the location, and directions to the venue.

Apply a cohesive animated/cartoon visual style throughout the entire site using bold outlines, glowing neon blues, cyan, and RGB color accents. Design should be vibrant, colorful, non-realistic, and appeal to teens and all ages.
Style all interactive elements (buttons, dropdowns, tabs) with a playful, clickable appearance using cartoon/comic aesthetics that make them obviously interactive and fun to use.
Include placeholder text 'Date & Time TBD' in appropriate sections where event timing information will be added later.
Render all generated gaming-themed illustrations as static assets in the frontend application.
Update the Schedule/Events page to display that events run until midnight (00:00) on both Day 1 and Day 2. Modify the timeline display to show the final event slot ending at midnight for each day.

new_feature_requests.summary: Home tab with event title, animated banner, and Shark LAN highlights
Tickets tab showing tiered tickets (£5/£10/£15), numbered, BYO PC/console info, 50 player capacity
Schedule/Events tab with dropdown menu for Day 1 and Day 2 activities, tournaments, game lineup
Support tab with dropdown menu for FAQ, rules, contact form, troubleshooting
Contact/Location tab with venue details, map, and directions
Animated/cartoon style design with bold outlines, neon blues, cyan, RGB accents
Gaming-themed illustrations: sharks, PCs, controllers, network cables, cheering crowd
Stylized, clickable buttons, dropdowns, and tabs with fun, high-energy design
Update schedule to show events run until midnight on both Day 1 and Day 2
